headline.main: BRITON HERE TELLS OF CRETE BATTLE; Captain of Cruiser Dido, in Navy Yard for Repairs, Says Nazis Lost 2,500 in One Fight

lead_paragraph: Captain Henry William Urquhart McCall, commander of the British light cruiser Dido, one of twelve British warships now being repaired in United States ports, for the first time gave a first-person story yesterday about his ship in action off the Island of Crete and also in other engagements including six months of convoy work, involving the safe delivery of hundreds of vessels loaded with freight for Great Britain.
abstract: Brit light cruiser, Dido, being repaired, Bklyn Navy Yd

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
